metaDescription: Multiplication chart generator creating a free printable pdf to download and share with students. Practise the multiplication table of thirty up to 100 and beyond with our times table charts.
heading: Multiplication Chart Generator
subHeading: Personalised and printable multiplication charts made in seconds for your students.

multiplicationTables.title: Multiplication Tables from 1-10
multiplicationTables.subtitle: Using a multiplication chart doesn’t just force you to remember your times tables, it allows you to learn the patterns and secrets within each times tables! The 1-10 multiplication charts are the most commonly used times tables and provide you with a great foundation for the basic arithmetic skills you will need in day-to-day life.

multiplicationTables.title: Multiplication Tables from 11-20
multiplicationTables.supertitle: Learn the times tables up to 20
multiplicationTables.subtitle: To improve your foundational mathematical ability learning the times tables from 11-20 can set you apart from the rest of the class! As you explore these times tables try and see what patterns you can spot.

multiplicationTables.title: Multiplication Tables from 21-30
multiplicationTables.supertitle: Learn the times tables up to 30
multiplicationTables.subtitle: For the super advanced students there are times tables from 21-30. These multiplication charts are super tough to learn! As you learn and memorise these see how they compare to the smaller times tables and try and see what techniques you can create to remember them!

printableChart.title: Printable Multiplication Chart
printableChart.subtitle: All of the AstroSafe worksheets can be printed out to use in your classroom - including the multiplication charts and times table exercises.  Why not give your students a multiplication chart each so they can stick it on their fridge at home? The more your students engage with their times tables the quicker they will remember them! Click below to create and customise your own multiplication charts and worksheets!
printableChart.supertitle: How to share your multiplication chart

createWorksheets.title: Importance of a multiplication chart
createWorksheets.subtitle:
Multiplication is one of the four core math operations (alongside addition, subtraction, and division). Having a good understanding of the core components of math provides the foundation to learn more complex parts of the curriculum quickly!
To learn the times tables it’s important to recite the times tables, complete targetted worksheets, and use multiplication in real world scenarios. The tools provided by AstroSafe make it simple for you to create the resources you need to learn the times tables very quickly!
createWorksheets.supertitle: Why learning the times tables is important

cards.question: Is the AstroSafe Worksheet Generator free to use?
cards.answer: The worksheet generator is free for 30 days with no credit card details needed. After the trial period ends you will be prompted to upgrade to our paid product. Alternatively you can continue on the Lite plan which still provides full access but limits usage.

cards.question: Can I create different worksheets?
cards.answer: Of course - we have a bunch of tools to create different worksheets all across the math curriculum. Create a free account and check out the dashboard to see what you can create! If you want worksheets we don’t currently offer - just email hello@astrosafe.co and let us know!

cards.question: Do you offer school discounts?
cards.answer: Yes we do! If you’re interested in creating an account for all of the teachers in your school please contact hello@astrosafe.co and we can create a plan that works for you!
